Detailed Description

Parameters of APSME-REMOVE-DEVICE.indication primitive.

See ZigBee Specification r19, Table 4.23, page 464.

Definition at line 108 of file apsmeRemoveDevice.h.

Field Documentation

ExtAddr_t APS_RemoveDeviceInd_t::srcAddress

[LE] The extended 64-bit address of the device requesting that a child device be removed.

Definition at line 112 of file apsmeRemoveDevice.h.

ExtAddr_t APS_RemoveDeviceInd_t::targetAddress

[LE] The extended 64-bit address of the target device that is requested to be removed.
